built_in_tools.name: codebase_search
built_in_tools.description: Semantic search tool for finding code snippets
built_in_tools.what_it_is: A semantic search engine for codebases
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Finds relevant code snippets based on semantic queries
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Provide search query and optional target directories

built_in_tools.name: read_file
built_in_tools.description: Read file contents with line range support
built_in_tools.what_it_is: File reading tool with selective line viewing
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Reads and displays file contents, can focus on specific line ranges
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Specify file path and line range or read entire file

built_in_tools.name: edit_file
built_in_tools.description: Edit existing files with precise code modifications
built_in_tools.what_it_is: Code editing tool for making targeted changes
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Applies precise edits to files while preserving existing code structure
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Specify target file, instructions, and code changes with existing code markers

built_in_tools.name: grep_search
built_in_tools.description: Fast regex-based text search using ripgrep
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Searches for exact text patterns and regex matches across files
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Provide regex pattern and optional file filters

built_in_tools.name: list_dir
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Lists directory contents to understand project structure

mcp_tools.name: mcp_memory_palace_memory_update
mcp_tools.description: Update memory palace with new knowledge
mcp_tools.what_it_does: Stores concepts, relationships, and learnings for future reference
mcp_tools.how_to_use: Provide workspace and updates array with knowledge items

user_resources.name: mentalmodels.md
user_resources.what_it_is: Documentation file listing 54 mental models with implementation status
user_resources.what_it_does: Provides specifications, use cases, and integration guidance for mental models
user_resources.how_to_use: Reference for understanding model requirements and updating implementation status

user_resources.name: PandA Codebase
user_resources.description: Existing mental models implementation in Python
user_resources.what_it_is: Python codebase with existing mental model implementations
user_resources.what_it_does: Contains base framework and 5 implemented mental models
user_resources.how_to_use: Examine existing patterns and extend with new implementations
